ddl.schema: claims_transaction_id STRING PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL COMMENT 'Primary Key. Unique Identifier of the claim transaction.', claim_id STRING COMMENT 'Foriegn key to the claim.', charge_id NUMERIC COMMENT 'Charge ID', patient_id STRING COMMENT 'Foriegn Key to the patient', type STRING COMMENT 'CHARGE: original line item. PAYMENT: payment made against a charge by an insurance company (aka Payer) or patient. ADJUSTMENT: change in the charge without a payment, made by an insurance company. TRANSFERIN and TRANSFEROUT: transfer of the balance from one insurance company to another, or to a patient.', amount NUMERIC COMMENT 'Dollar amount for a CHARGE or TRANSFERIN', method STRING COMMENT 'Payment made by CASH, CHECK, ECHECK, COPAY, SYSTEM (adjustments without payment), or CC (credit card).', from_date DATETIME COMMENT 'Transaction start date', to_date DATETIME COMMENT 'Transaction end date.', place_of_service STRING COMMENT 'Foriegn Key to the Organization', procedure_code STRING COMMENT 'SNOMED-CT or other code (e.g. CVX for Vaccines) for the service.', Modifier1 STRING COMMENT 'Unused. Modifier on procedure code.',Modifier2 STRING COMMENT 'Unused. Modifier on procedure code.', DiagnosisRef1 NUMERIC COMMENT 'Number indicating which diagnosis code from the claim applies to this transaction, 1-8 are valid options.', DiagnosisRef2 NUMERIC COMMENT 'Number indicating which diagnosis code from the claim applies to this transaction, 1-8 are valid options.', DiagnosisRef3 NUMERIC COMMENT 'Number indicating which diagnosis code from the claim applies to this transaction, 1-8 are valid options.', DiagnosisRef4 NUMERIC COMMENT 'Number indicating which diagnosis code from the claim applies to this transaction, 1-8 are valid options.', Units NUMERIC COMMENT 'Number of units of the service.', Department_ID NUMERIC COMMENT 'Placeholder for department.',Notes STRING COMMENT 'Description of the service or transaction.', Unit_Amount NUMERIC COMMENT 'Cost per unit.', Transfer_Out_ID NUMERIC COMMENT 'If the transaction is a TRANSFERIN, the Charge ID of the corresponding TRANSFEROUT row.', Transfer_Type STRING COMMENT '1 if transferred to the primary insurance, 2 if transferred to the secondary insurance, or p if transferred to the patient.', Payments NUMERIC COMMENT 'Dollar amount of a payment for a PAYMENT row.', Adjustments NUMERIC COMMENT 'Dollar amount of an adjustment for an ADJUSTMENTS row.', Transfers NUMERIC COMMENT 'Dollar amount of a transfer for a TRANSFERIN or TRANSFEROUT row.', Outstanding NUMERIC COMMENT 'Dollar amount left unpaid after this transaction was applied.', Appointment_ID UUID COMMENT 'Foreign key to the Encounter.', Line_Note STRING COMMENT 'Note.', Patient_Insurance_ID UUID COMMENT 'Foreign key to the Payer Transitions table member ID.', Fee_Schedule_ID NUMERIC COMMENT 'Fixed to 1.', Provider_ID UUID COMMENT 'Foreign key to the Provider.', Supervising_Provider_ID UUID COMMENT 'Foreign key to the supervising Provider.'
